meanings.definition: The armpits or the cavity beneath the junction of the arm and shoulder.
meanings.sent1: She applied deodorant to her axillae before going to the gym.
meanings.sent2: The doctor checked her axillae for any signs of swelling.
meanings.sent3: During the hot summer, her axillae became the perfect spot for a cool breeze.
meanings.sent4: In the crowded concert hall, the axillae were the only place to find some personal space.
meanings.sent5: The dancer raised her arms, revealing her smooth axillae to the audience.
